description: Bo’s Coffee is the Philippines’ first nationwide specialist coffee chain offering a blend of homegrown beans. Celebrating sustainability and Philippine local communities, Bo’s serves coffee from local farmers and a selection of food and beverages made by entrepreneurs who share Bo’s values, all in a setting of locally crafted furniture and décor.
Boatsetter is a peer-to-peer boat sharing platform that combines the rental mechanics of Airbnb with the on-demand labor dynamics of Uber to deliver a hassle-free boat rental experience.
Bodytech is a chain of health and fitness centers in Latin America.

description: Bold is building a digital bank for SMEs in Colombia. Bold’s first product, a low-cost payment terminal, allows entrepreneurs from small and medium enterprises to receive payments using a credit or debit card from Mastercard, Visa, or American Express.
BONX is a communication technology company that produces stylish Bluetooth headsets as well as a mostly handsfree VoIP system for groups communicating with unreliable Internet connections.
BOS is a premium rooibos iced tea African beverage brand.
BrandsEye is a social data and insights business that helps large organisations identify, analyze and prioritise their most valuable digital customer interactions.
Brisanet is the biggest independent fiber optic internet provider in Brazil, connecting millions of households in rural Northeast region to the world. The company went public on B3 in July 2021.

Brodo is Indonesia’s first direct to consumer footwear company. Brodo utilizes and supports quality shoemakers and factories in the country to create purposeful contemporary products that meet the needs of an increasingly stylish and lifestyle-minded customer.
Brooklyn Fitboxing is a franchised boutique fitness concept which combines music, non-contact boxing, and high-intensity interval training (HIIT) in a way that is approachable and fun for all levels.
BSale has created an operational management solution that replaces the spreadsheets, notes and receipts SMEs in LatAm usually depend on to manage procurement and sales.
Buffalo Burger is a local fast food burger chain with over 30 branches across the country leveraging a franchise model.
Buin Zoo is Chile’s leading zoo for animal care, education, and conservation, pioneering the concept of education through entertainment.

Buk is a Chilean HR tech company, creating a more efficient tool for companies to automate their HR processes. Buk is present the entire life cycle of an employee, from the selection process to off-boarding.
Bunch is the first app that allows people to group video chat while playing mobile games.
Bunny Studio is a marketplace to outsource creative projects quickly, easily and affordably: voiceovers, voice acting, dubbing, scriptwriting, content creation and transcreation to several languages.
Buscalibre is the largest virtual bookstore in Chile.

Business News Americas is a subscription-based service providing elite industry-specific information in English and Spanish to Latin America’s business leaders and decision-makers via a daily, real-time Internet news service.
Buzzoole is a marketing services company that automates, manages and measures investments with influencers using proprietary technology.
CallForce provides outsourced contact center solutions to blue chip corporate clients across the global market.
